column2:
"I've been saying special training over
and over, but they haven't really been that special."
"But this time I don't think you'll have any complaints! No, this is going to be extremely difficult!"
"I'm nearly dizzy just from thinking about completing the coast probe with an S rank... eh, you don't think so?"
"Oh, you can't underestimate it! If you don't think well on how to fight, you'll likely be killed in a blink of an eye."

"今まで特訓特訓って言いながら
あんまり特訓になってなかったもんね。"

"でも今回のは文句なしだと思うな！
いやー、もう超すごい難しいんだから！"

"海岸探索をＳランクでクリアなんて
考えただけでクラクラしそう……
え、そうでもない？"

"いやいやなめたらいけないよー？
よーく考えて戦わないと、あなたが
ずばっとやられちゃうかもよー？"
